comments.author: Trevor Higgins
comments.comment:
Couple of comments/suggestions
1) Can we remove rename the method to getQualifiers() since we know its on the AbsenceReason, we dont need to be so explicit? I know the other methods are called getAbsenceReasonName etc, but I think they are too much also (dont change those though)
2) Can we have an overloaded version of this where you can pass in a String representing "no qualifier"? This way, we can have the default of "-" or else caller can specfify the string to return when there are no qualifiers.
3) Can we add a method for getFullyQualifiedName() which returns the name plus the reult of this method, passing empty string as the qualifier to the newly overloaded method above?
4) Update all tests with method names and add new tests for new methods
This will allow one place to get the entire FQN, or qualifiers piece, in whatever format the caller wants.
Similar comments for AbsenceRelationship.
